Detailed Description

Spiking neural network simulation.

This class abstract the behaviour of a spiking neural network simulation. It loads the network, gets the input spikes and finally produces the output spikes. Moreover, this class generates some simulation statistics.

Author:
Jesus Garrido

Richard Carrillo

Date:
August 2008

Class constructor with parameters.

It creates a new object an initilizes its elements.

Parameters:
NetworkFile Network description file name. The network will be loaded from this file.
WeightsFile Weights description file name. The network synaptic weights will be loaded from this file.
SimulationTime Simulation total time.
NewSimulationStep Simulation step time.
throw EDLUTException If something wrong happens.

Member Function Documentation

void Simulation::RunSimulationStep (  )  throw (EDLUTException) [protected]

It realizes the main process of simulation.

It propagates the spikes after the input is loaded. This propagation ends when the simulation time is higher than the total simulation time or when no more activity is produced.

Precondition:
The activity has been previously loaded.
Exceptions:
EDLUTException If something wrong happends in the spike propagation process.

It sets the saving weights step time.
